009package GenericFilterDemos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterVector;
015import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
016import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
017
018/**
019 * This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a 3x3 custom generic vector filter based on class
020 * {@link GenericFilterVector}. This plugin works for all types of images.
021 *
022 * @author WB
023 * @version 2022/03/30
024 */
025public class Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
026
027
028    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
029        return DOES_ALL;
030    }
031
032    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
033        new ExampleFilterVector3x3().applyTo(ip);    
034    }
035
036    // -------------------------------------------------------------
037    
038    private static class ExampleFilterVector3x3 extends GenericFilterVector {
039        private final static float[][] H = {
040                        {1, 2, 1},
041                        {2, 4, 2},
042                        {1, 2, 1}};
043        
044        private final int width = 3;
045        private final int height = 3;
046        private final int xc = 1;
047        private final int yc = 1;
048        private final float s = 16;
049        
050        @Override
051        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
052                int depth = pack.getDepth();
053                float[] sum = new float[depth];
054                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
055                        int vj = v + j - yc;
056                        for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
057                                int ui = u + i - xc;
058                                float[] p = pack.getPix(ui, vj);
059                                for (int k = 0; k < depth; k++) {
060                                        sum[k] = sum[k] + (p[k] * H[i][j]) / s;
061                                }
062                        }
063                }
064                return sum;
065        }
066    }
067}
